database.storageHint: Tracks and fingerprints will be stored in the selected database. Ensure sufficient space.
database.existingHint: If you already have a database, pick its manifest (.frkbdb). If missing, choose the legacy folder and it will be upgraded silently.
database.locationRetain: Current database stays at original path; you can delete it or keep using.
database.cannotRead: No FRKB database detected at this path, or the path is unavailable.
database.possibleDamage: Please select an existing FRKB database (.frkbdb), or choose a folder to create a new one.
database.initHintExisting: In the file picker, select the {manifestName} file to enter the existing database.
database.initHintCreate: Select a folder and enter the database name. A subfolder with that name will be created as the database.
database.selectFingerprintModeRequired: Please choose a fingerprint mode (PCM content hash or File hash)
database.invalidManifestFile: Not a valid FRKB database manifest
database.dirHasDatabase: The selected folder already contains a database.
database.dirHasDatabaseOptions: Confirm: enter as existing; Cancel: choose to reset to a brand-new database.
database.parentIsInsideDb: The selected parent path is inside an existing database. Creating a new one inside is not allowed. Please choose:
database.manifestAlreadyExists: FRKB.database (.frkbdb) already exists in this directory. You cannot create a new database here. Please select that file in 'Select existing database', or use an empty directory.
database.resetConfirm: Dangerous: this will clear the library and fingerprints, resetting to a brand-new database. Continue?
database.nonEmptyDirConfirm: The selected directory is not empty. Create a database here anyway? (Using an empty directory or a new subfolder is recommended)

cloudSync.needUserKeyBeforeDanger: You must configure userKey before performing this dangerous operation. Opening settings...

errors.sensitiveOperationTooFrequent: Sensitive ops too frequent. Try later.
errors.rateLimitWarning8: FYI: 8 syncs in 5 min. This is 9th. To avoid rate limiting, retry in {seconds}s
errors.rateLimitWarning9: FYI: 9 syncs in 5 min. This is 10th. Retry in {seconds}s
errors.limitExceeded: Server fingerprint quota exceeded (limit: {limit}). Sync aborted.
errors.limitExceededOnCheck: Would exceed server fingerprint quota (limit: {limit}). Sync aborted.

summary.analyze: Final total {final} would exceed the limit

reset.title: Dangerous: Reset cloud fingerprints
reset.description: This will delete ALL fingerprints and metas linked to current userKey on server (usage stats not reset). IRREVERSIBLE. Type DELETE to continue.

library.deduplicateHint: Compare with the fingerprint library; duplicates are skipped (even if previously deleted). When 'Delete after import' is enabled, duplicate files are moved to the Recycle Bin library.
library.fingerprintHint: Generate and retain content fingerprints for imported tracks to support future deduplication; they remain even if the track is deleted.
library.nameInvalidChars: Name cannot contain: < > : " / \ | ? * or control characters
library.notExistOnDisk: This item is missing on disk; it may have been deleted.

tracks.title: Tracks
tracks.noTracksHint: Drop folders or audio files to import.

player.hideControlsShowWaveform: Hide controls to show longer waveform
player.aiffNotSupported: AIFF/AIF format is not supported for playback

fingerprints.importMergeHint: New fingerprints will merge into old.
fingerprints.exportHint: Exported file can be merged on other devices via 'Import fingerprint DB file'.
fingerprints.analysisHint: Analyze all audio in folder/subfolders; store results only; no file changes.
fingerprints.modeFileHint: Calculates on whole file. Fastest but cannot ignore noise; same song with different covers will be treated as different.
fingerprints.modeIncompatibleWarning: Two fingerprint libraries are fully isolated and do not interoperate; switching only affects future analysis and won't migrate/merge history.

import.waitForTask: Please wait for the current task

update.networkIssue: Network issue. Check connection or use a proxy.
update.downloadCompleted: Download done. FRKB will update after restart.
update.updateDownloaded: Update downloaded. FRKB will upgrade next start.

shortcuts.shortcutSetFailed: Failed to set shortcut. May conflict.

about.author: Author: Coder 'Programmer/DJ'
about.prereleaseHint: This is a pre-release build. May be unstable. Please use with caution or download the stable version.

errorReport.hint: Only crash and error logs are uploaded. No user data is included.

errors.diskFullInterruptedHint: Insufficient space. Completed {0}, pending {1}. Free space then retry or skip the rest.

filters.noResultsHint: Try widening conditions or clear filters.

settings.showPlaylistTrackCount: Show track count after playlist name

songListBubble.title: Track row bubble tooltip
songListBubble.overflowOnly: Show only when text is truncated
songListBubble.hint: Controls how tooltips show in track lists

fileSelector.title: Select Files and Folders
fileSelector.helpText: Click to select/deselect items, double-click folders to navigate, Enter to confirm, Esc to cancel
fileSelector.name: Name
